title: Era um tempo que não tinha um grupo

lines.br: Era um tempo que não tinha um grupo
lines.en: It was a time when there were no groups

lines.br: Não formava mestre por a graduação
lines.en: When Mestres were not made by graduations
By looking they learnt how to play
Each person had their own expression
The student was a disciple
Learning from the Mestre every lesson
I miss it a lot

lines.br: Por o tempo que não voltar mais
lines.en: For the time that won't return
Capoeira was a game
The capoeirista had value

lines.br: Era um tempo que não tinha um grupo
lines.en: It was a time when there were no groups

lines.br: Não formava mestre por a graduação
lines.en: When Mestres were not made by graduations
By looking they learnt how to play
Each person had their own expression
The student was a disciple
Learning from the Mestre every lesson
I miss it a lot

lines.br: Por o tempo que não voltar mais
lines.en: For the time that won't return
In the Bahia of the other time

lines.br: De Mestre Pastinha e Mestre Waldemar
lines.en: Of Mestre Pastinha and Mestre Waldemar
The Ladainha of Angola

lines.br: Onde o canto me faz recordar
lines.en: Where the song reminds me

lines.br: De um tempo que era tão bom
lines.en: Of a time that was so good
One day I want to live it
To know all the malicia
And also all the mandinga
